strings.platforms.unique_extensions_description: When determining the platform of a ROM or image (which is later used when determining the game title), only the "Unique File Extensions" are used. All other extensions are ignored as they will limit the ability of Gaseous to determine the game title (see {0} for more information on how matching works).
